trans-unit.source: Serves as a base class for readers of incoming request parameters for Web services implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 針對使用 HTTP 實作但不具有 SOAP 的 Web 服務，充當連入要求參數之讀取器的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> and other classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> 類別和其他類別<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols>命名空間支援.NET Framework 實作 Web 服務透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業。

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務寫入器和讀取序列化和還原序列化，分別參數或 Web 方法的傳回物件之間的 HTTP 要求或回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務寫入器和讀取器使用 HTTP 傳輸，但不會交換使用 SOAP 標準的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> class provides, among other methods, a common <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method for all service-side readers of collections of name/value pairs into Web method parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader>類別提供，其他方法，在一般<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A>方法之所有服務端讀取器的集合的名稱/值組給 Web 方法參數。

trans-unit.source: The name/value pairs have been parsed from an incoming HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 名稱/值組剖析從傳入的 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: You typically will not need to use <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> or its descendant classes directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會不需要使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader>或其直接下階的類別。

trans-unit.source: The appropriate types are used according to settings in an ASP.NET configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: 按照 ASP.NET 組態檔 (Web.config) 中的設定，會使用適當的類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" />，可指定要取得初始設定式的 Web 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an initializer for the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定方法的初始設定式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> representing the Web method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" />，表示 Web 方法。

trans-unit.source: The object returned by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method is the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> property of the `methodinfo` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的物件<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A>屬性`methodinfo`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> property value is an array of type <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A>屬性值是陣列型別的<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method is invoked during service initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A>服務初始化期間叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: Later, at the time a request is processed, the initializer object is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A> method of another <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> instance.
trans-unit.target: 稍後，在處理要求時，初始設定式物件會傳遞至<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A>另一個方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The other instance performs the actual reading.
trans-unit.target: 另一個執行個體執行實際的讀取。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> array, obtained through the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> 陣列，可透過 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters" /> 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> 屬性取得。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A> method is invoked at the time a request is processed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A>處理要求時叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: The input parameter, `o`, is obtained by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method on another instance during service initialization.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的參數、 `o`，透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A>服務初始化時的另一個執行個體上的方法。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a method definition's parameter definitions are supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 判斷方法定義的參數定義是否受 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> 類別的支援。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> that specifies the parameter to check.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" />，指定要檢查的參數。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a particular parameter type is supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 判斷特定參數型別是否受 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> 類別的支援。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a method's parameter definitions are supported by the reader; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器可支援方法的參數定義，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> that specifies the method to check.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" />，指定要檢查的方法。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a method definition's parameter definitions are supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 判斷方法定義的參數定義是否受 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> 類別的支援。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a method's parameter definitions are supported by the reader; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器可支援方法的參數定義，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> object that specifies the collection of name/value pairs containing method parameter names and values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 物件，指定包含方法參數名稱和值的名稱 / 值組集合。

trans-unit.source: Translates a collection of name/value pairs into an array of objects representing method parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 將名稱 / 值組的集合轉譯為表示方法參數值的物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Object" /> objects representing method parameter values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 物件的陣列，表示方法參數值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method defined in thetwo classes derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlParameterReader> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterReader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A>方法定義於兩個類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader>，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlParameterReader>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterReader>。

trans-unit.source: Those two classes' <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> methods take an <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個類別<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A>方法會採用<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>參數。
